explains: n. 沉思，冥想；打算，意图；凝视，默默注视

sentences.en: He sat there deep in contemplation.
The archetypal extrovert prefers action to contemplation, risk-taking to heed-taking, certainty to doubt.
sentences.cn: 典型的外向者更喜欢行动而不是沉思，喜欢冒险而不是谨慎，喜欢确定性而不是疑虑。

sentences.en: What we seem to be sacarificing in all our surfing and searching is our capacity to engage in the quieter, attentive modes of thought that underpin contemplation, reflection and introspection.
sentences.cn: 在我们所有的浏览和搜索中，似乎最神圣的是我们从事于更安静、专注的思维模式的能力，而这种思维模式是沉思、反思和内省的基础。
